title: SAVE TIME
description: No more tracking spreadsheets and shoe boxes full of trade confirmations. All your trades, dividends and share splits are automatically incorporated.

title: GET PEACE-OF-MIND
description: All your information is secure, and you'll know exactly how your investments are performing with detailed reports and optional weekly emails & price alerts.

title: USE IT FREE, FOR LIFE
description: No credit card or other hassles. Just create your account and import your holdings. No software to install or update.

title: SAVE MONEY
description: Stop paying your accountant for tax reports and other information that you can get for free, with just one click.
